name: News Publisher Autopilot
author: WPMagic

sections.description:
With the News API for WordPress you can have in minutes a modern and profesional NEWS Website, updated automaticaly with the latest NEWS from the choosed Topic or Country.
News API made for newsapi.org API. A powerful news, modern, trending website.
Topic/ Country news with the news API from newsapi.org. Please check the “News API Terms of Service” at https://newsapi.org/terms.

Translations

  • English – default, always included

Credits

  • The WPM News API was posible because of the great job of the theam from NewsAPI.org (https://newsapi.org).
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

e.g.

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/wpm-news-api directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Use the Admin Menu->WP news API->Settings screen to configure the plugin
  4. Find more about the WP news API plugin at https://docs.wpmagic.cloud
sections.faq:
How can I have a news autoblog?

  1. Install the WPM News API Plugin
  2. Choose a Theme special for News
  3. Configure the plugin
  4. Enjoy your new News website

short_description: Your News Website on Autopilot. It is using the newsapi.org API to fetch the News from more than 30 000 News Sources.
